original: Arnwald, Karl Gösta Valentin, provinsialläkare, Mellerud, f. 28/8/98 i Söderköping. G. 41 m. Gunhild Snöbohm. Barn: Christer f. 35, Ulla 39 (i föreg. äkt.), Gunilla 43. — Studrex. i Linköp. 16, med. kand. i Upps. 21, med. lic. i Sthlm 36. Undiläk. v. Ny-köp. las. 26-27, statens bakt. lab. 29, und :läk. v. sanat. i Sundsvall 29-31, stadsläk. i Söderköp. 31-37, e. läk. v. Sthlms epidisjukh. 35, undiläk. v. Skellefteå las. 37, prov :läk. i Klintehamn 37-43, dito i Mellerud sed. 43, div. läkiuppdr. s. skolläk., v. sinnesslö-anst., vårdhem f. kron. sjuka, i barna-v:ndr, Röda korset m. m. Led. av stadsfullm. i Söderköp. 34-37, ordf. i hälsovmdn där 31-37.
translated: Arnwald, Karl Gösta Valentin, Provincial Doctor, Mellerud, born August 28, 1898 in Söderköping. Married Gunhild Snöbohm in 1941. Children: Christer b. 1935, Ulla b. 1939 (from a previous marriage), Gunilla b. 1943. Studied in Linköping in 1916, received a degree in medicine in Uppsala in 1921, obtained a medical license in Stockholm in 1936. Worked as an assistant physician at Nyköping Hospital from 1926-1927, at the State Bacteriology Laboratory in 1929, as a physician at a tuberculosis sanatorium in Sundsvall from 1929-1931, as a city physician in Söderköping from 1931-1937, as a physician at the Stockholm Epidemic Hospital in 1935, and as an assistant physician at Skellefteå Hospital in 1937. He served as a provincial doctor in Klintehamn from 1937-1943, and then in Mellerud from 1943 until his retirement. He also had various other medical assignments including school doctor, at a psychiatric hospital, at a nursing home for chronic patients, and for the Red Cross, among others. He was a member of the city council in Söderköping from 1934-1937 and served as chairman of the health committee there from 1931-1937.
